unnormalised: **New Wheels on the Road! Desi Automotive Scene Heating Up!**
normalised: New Wheels on the Road! Desi Automotive Scene Heating Up!

unnormalised: Oi, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, because the Indian automotive market is buzzing with new launches! Tata Motors just dropped the new 'Nexon Facelift' in Mumbai, boasting a revamped design and supposedly better mileage. Early reviews are saying it’s a serious contender in the compact SUV segment.
normalised: Oi, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, because the Indian automotive market is buzzing with new launches! Tata Motors just dropped the new 'Nexon Facelift' in Mumbai, boasting a revamped design and supposedly better mileage. Early reviews are saying it's a serious contender in the compact S U V segment.

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Mahindra is rumored to be launching the 'Scorpio N Adventure Edition' near Diwali, targeted at those adventurous souls craving rugged off-road capabilities. Speculations include upgraded suspension and beefier tires.
normalised: Not to be left behind, Mahindra is rumored to be launching the 'Scorpio N Adventure Edition' near Diwali, targeted at those adventurous souls craving rugged off-road capabilities. Speculations include upgraded suspension and beefier tires.

unnormalised: And hold onto your chai, folks! We hear Hyundai is planning a 'Creta EV' launch sometime next year. Dr. Sharma from IIT Madras was spotted at the unveiling, hinting at possible collaboration.
normalised: And hold onto your chai, folks! We hear Hyundai is planning a 'Creta E V' launch sometime next year. Doctor Sharma from I I T Madras was spotted at the unveiling, hinting at possible collaboration.

unnormalised: But wait, there's more! A brand new EV startup, 'Electra Motors' based out of Bangalore, has teased their first model – a sleek-looking sedan with a claimed range of 600 km and a price tag starting at Rs. 25 Lakhs. The Electra factory is said to be sprawled over 100,000 sq ft. Will they be able to take on the big boys? Only time will tell! Stay tuned for more updates!
normalised: But wait, there's more! A brand new E V startup, 'Electra Motors' based out of Bangalore, has teased their first model – a sleek-looking sedan with a claimed range of six hundred kilometer and a price tag starting at rupees twenty five lakh. The Electra factory is said to be sprawled over one hundred thousand square feet. Will they be able to take on the big boys? Only time will tell! Stay tuned for more updates!
